title: Old Judge Commons Available - ALL SOLD
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: Old Judge Commons Available - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
[STRIKE]Charlie Bastian - good looking card; nice corners; glue stain on back - [/STRIKE]SOLD
[STRIKE]Bob Clark - great clarity; nice corners; small area of surface gloss missing in lower right corner; interesting presentation with matching hand-written name/team immediately above mechanical version; glue stain on back - [/STRIKE]SOLD
[STRIKE]Arlie Latham[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]- great clarity; nice corners; small sliver of picture/emulsion layer missing from upper right corner; glue stain on back[/STRIKE] - SOLD
[STRIKE]Pat Murphy[/STRIKE] - [STRIKE]great pose with Murphy "flipping the bird" on the bat hand; one of only three players so pictured in the Old Judge set[/STRIKE]; [STRIKE]great clarity; nice corners; glue stain on back[/STRIKE] - SOLD
[STRIKE]Mike Slattery - good looking card; nice corners; glue stain on back - [/STRIKE]SOLD

Prices include shipping/insurance.
Emails to [url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url]
One down (Latham sold); four to go.
Two down (Murphy sold); three to go.
Who has the better deal on an N172 Bob Cark? :rolleyes:
But his is the Hands on Knees, Paper Missing at Left pose.

Pre-Christmas Sale!
